subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The “Oscar Robertson Rule,” put into effect six years after Robertson filed a suit against the N.B.A. over a number of free-agency issues, helped make free agency possible and led to lucrative player salaries.
snippet: The “Oscar Robertson Rule,” put into effect six years after Robertson filed a suit against the N.B.A. over a number of free-agency issues, helped make free agency possible and led to lucrative player salaries.
